Package moteur.strategy

Given the fact that a PlayerVirtuel should make the disicion like a humain do, at the meantime they should act differently according to the level of difficulity chosen before a game start, we use the Design Pattern Stragety to realize that. This package containes differnets strategies and can be easly extended by simply adda a file xxx.java.

The PlayerVirtuel will have two operations, makeOffer(Player playerOwn) and takeOffer(Player playerOwn), and the corresponding strategies are :

  • makeOffer(Player playerOwn) : faceUpTheBigger and faceUpTheFirst
  • takeOffer(Player playerOwn) : randomTake, takeTheBest and takeTheBestEnfer
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Strategy
    This interface Strategy uses the Design Pattern, which enables selecting a specific algorithm or methode to excute at a run time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    faceUpTheBigger
    This is an implementation of Strategy as well as the Design Pattern "Stragety".
    faceUpTheFirst
    This is an implementation of Strategy as well as the Design Pattern "Stragety".
    PlayerVirtuelContext
    This class PlayerVirtualContext shows the Design pattern "Strategy", containes a setStragety(Strategy playStrategy) a startExecuteMakeOffer(Player playerOwn) and a startExecuteTakeOffer(Player playerOwn)
    randomTake
    This is an implementation of Strategy as well as the Design Pattern "Stragety".
    takeTheBest
    This is an implementation of Strategy as well as the Design Pattern "Stragety".
    takeTheBestEnfer
    This is an implementation of Strategy as well as the Design Pattern "Stragety".
